boardgame.name: Arena: Revolte in Rom II
Arena: Roma II
boardgame.description: The revolt in Rome will not end for a long time to come! Join the action and find out who is the most powerful ruler by skillfully playing your cards. No matter if you strengthen your own position with strong cards like Arena or Ballista or if you augment your victory points with Templarius and Triremis - you will be the winner if you use your characters and buildings with wit and savvy. You may also combine Roma II - Arena with Roma and discover even more options._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Arena is a complete game of its own, but it may very well be combined with the cards from Roma. These are the play options:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Mix all the cards of both games and play with the combined set._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Both players take one set of cards. Players will have their own draw and discard piles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Both players can use the cards of both games, compiling their own decks of 55 cards each. Again, both players will have their own draw and discard piles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Roma_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2010 Golden Geek Best 2-Player Board Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: mint! from NOV 09

New in Shrink. £3.00 postage to UK. I will ship worldwide (please ask, if outside the UK, for a shipping quote before ordering), combine orders for cheaper postage and will give a 2.5% discount for purchases over £50 and 5% for purchases over £100. All items (700 unique games) I list are in stock and will be posted within 24 working hours of payment being received.
Queen Games.

Queen Games (QNG 70093) The revolt in Rome will not end for a long time to come! Join the action and find out who is the most powerful ruler by skillfully playing your cards. No matter if you strengthen your own position with strong cards like Arena or Ballista or if you augment your victory points with Templarius and Triremis - you will be the winner if you use your characters and buildings with wit and savvy. You may also combine Roma II - Arena with Roma and discover even more options. Arena is a complete game of its own, but it may very well be combined with the cards from Roma. These are the play options: - Mix all the cards of both games and play with the combined set. - Both players take one set of cards. Players will have their own draw and discard piles. - Both players can use the cards of both games, compiling their own decks of 55 cards each. Again, both players will have their own draw and discard piles.

Queen Games (QNG 70093) The revolt in Rome will not end for a long time to come! Join the action and find out who is the most powerful ruler by skillfully playing your cards. No matter if you strengthen your own position with strong cards like Arena or Ballista or if you augment your victory points with Templarius and Triremis - you will be the winner if you use your characters and buildings with wit and savvy. You may also combine Roma II - Arena with Roma and discover even more options. Arena is a complete game of its own, but it may very well be combined with the cards from Roma. These are the play options: - Mix all the cards of both games and play with the combined set. - Both players take one set of cards. Players will have their own draw and discard piles. - Both players can use the cards of both games, compiling their own decks of 55 cards each. Again, both players will have their own draw and discard piles.

The game: German edition from Queen. All game parts are punched but still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
reserved for auction

reserved for LordHellfury
Buyer pays shipping
Opened, complete, like new.

Includes both Roma _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Arena: Roma II. Both of the games are in like new condition overall. The boxes have very minimal shelf wear on the corners, but the components are punched and in unplayed/like new condition. If you only want one or the other title, GM me and we can talk. I can ship them in a single box if you prefer (Both games fit quite well in either the Roma I or Roma II box, take your pick), or I can ship both boxes in a single parcel though it might be a bit more expensive to ship both boxes. I make sure to ship games so that they arrive at your door in the same condition that they left my house in. The interior of game boxes will be packed to make sure contents do not shift during transit. I will ship only to residences within the United States. Parcel tracking is mandatory for your and my protection. Insurance is strongly recommended. Buyer pays all shipping costs. I only charge exact shipping amounts. I generally quote a bit higher on shipping estimates to make sure all costs are covered but any amount that goes over actual shipping costs I will refund. Games are expensive enough as it is without shipping costs biting into them. GM me with any questions you might have or to request a shipping estimate to your zipcode.
For user kamf, auction win.
This game was played twice and is in excellent condition. I will ship via USPS and shipping costs $6.
